sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH), ranking member of the House Judiciary Committee, has tipped his hand on what he will do if the GOP flips the House after midterms, making Jordan chairman.
title: JORDAN’S HIT LIST: GOP Majority Going After Garland, Mayorkas, Fauci

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan amplified Trump's dangerous threats with a retweet, which Mediaite noticed.
author: John Amato
title: Jordan Amplifies Trump's Call To Execute Hillary Operatives

sentence: Washington Examiner [Ohio Congressman Jim Jordan interviewed by Maria Bartiromo on Sunday] “Remember, it started off as, ‘Oh, it wasn’t his laptop.’ Then it was, ‘Well, it was his laptop, but it was Russian disinformation.’ Now it’s, ‘No, it wasn’t Russian disinformation, but Joe had nothing to do with it,'” Jordan said.
author: Dr. Tar
title: Dems Spinning Furiously to Explain Away Biden Corruption
